instructions: Open your device's main Settings menu. In the System section, tap Accessibility . Follow the steps for your version of Android: Android 3.2 or earlier : Enable the Accessibility tick box, then enable the TalkBack tick box. Android 4.0 : Select TalkBack and slide the TalkBack switch to the ON position. Go back to the previous screen and enable Explore by touch . Android 4.1 and above : Select TalkBack and slide the TalkBack switch to the ON position.
